io.netty.handler.ssl

Class OpenSslContext

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.netty.handler.ssl.SslContext
      • io.netty.handler.ssl.OpenSslContext
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    OpenSslClientContext, OpenSslServerContext

    public abstract class OpenSslContext
extends SslContext

      • context

        @Deprecated
public final long context()
        Deprecated. use sslCtxPointer()
        Returns the pointer to the SSL_CTX object for this OpenSslContext. Be aware that it is freed as soon as the finalize() method is called. At this point 0 will be returned.

      • stats

        @Deprecated
public final OpenSslSessionStats stats()
        Deprecated. use #sessionContext#stats()
        Returns the stats of this context.

      • setRejectRemoteInitiatedRenegotiation

        public void setRejectRemoteInitiatedRenegotiation(boolean rejectRemoteInitiatedRenegotiation)
        Specify if remote initiated renegotiation is supported or not. If not supported and the remote side tries to initiate a renegotiation a SSLHandshakeException will be thrown during decoding.

      • finalize

        protected final void finalize()
                       throws Throwable
        Overrides:

public final void setTicketKeys(byte[] keys)

        Specified by:
        sessionContext in class SslContext

      • sslCtxPointer

        public final long sslCtxPointer()
        Returns the pointer to the SSL_CTX object for this OpenSslContext. Be aware that it is freed as soon as the finalize() method is called. At this point 0 will be returned.
